mapper.sql: id, look_shop_id, transfer_shop_id, look_degree, success_time, introduction, browse_number, transfer_degree,sys_user
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from success_case
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into success_case (id, look_shop_id, transfer_shop_id, look_degree, success_time, introduction, browse_number, transfer_degree,sys_user) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lookShopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transferShopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lookDegree,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{successTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{browseNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{transferDegree,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysUser,jdbcType=BIGINT})

update success_case
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
look_shop_id = #{record.lookShopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transfer_shop_id = #{record.transferShopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
look_degree = #{record.lookDegree,jdbcType=INTEGER},

introduction = #{record.introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
browse_number = #{record.browseNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT},
transfer_degree = #{record.transferDegree,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update success_case set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, look_shop_id = #{record.lookShopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transfer_shop_id = #{record.transferShopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, look_degree = #{record.lookDegree,jdbcType=INTEGER}, success_time = #{record.successTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, introduction = #{record.introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, browse_number = #{record.browseNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, transfer_degree = #{record.transferDegree,jdbcType=INTEGER}

look_shop_id = #{lookShopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transfer_shop_id = #{transferShopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
look_degree = #{lookDegree,jdbcType=INTEGER},
success_time = #{successTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
browse_number = #{browseNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT},
transfer_degree = #{transferDegree,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
